Attributes.description: Formal methods relevant to probabilistic and inductive reasoning. Decision theory, game theory, axiomatic probability theory and its interpretations, belief dynamics, simulation and modelling.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of PHIL 125, PHIL 220. (or instructor permission.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 10:00, End Time: 11:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: D222
